aka: The Tale of the Old Echo
trans_title: The Tale of the Old Echo
introduction: Little Fox, walking through the forest, met and made friends with an echo, then, having come home, he told his father about this. It turned out that when Fox' father was little, he also played with this echo. After waiting for the evening, Father Fox went to the forest to meet with him and remember his gone childhood. At the meeting, an echo recognized an old friend, and they began to play the same way as many years ago.
